attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the proposed increase in fees for immigration matters. I'm
writing as an adoptive parent of an international child, also in the process of
adopting a second child from overseas. If you are going to increase these fees,
then please at least increase the adoption tax credits at the same time. Or
could you distinguish between adoption expenses and those of other types of
immigrants? International adoption is a wonderful way to build a family and to
strengthen international ties and good will, AND it's already expensive! The
adoption-related expenses would be increased by more than 50% with this new
proposal! Thank you for your time.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sarah Bell Earley
